description:
Dr. Aomori has arranged a golf tournament with a new video recorder as the prize. Kenta, Kame, and Kinzo are determined to help Machiko win it by any means necessary!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hip de Swing Ichi, Ni, San
Swing with the Hips, One, Two, Three
ヒップでスイング1[イチ],2[ニー],3[サン]
